= Introduction =

Useful Links for the 2015 season

= 2015 Software =

  * Installing Eclipse for FRC 2015 (pdf)<br>http://www.usfirst.org/sites/default/files/uploadedFiles/Robotics_Programs/FRC/Game_and_Season__Info/2015/Installing_Eclipse_C_Java_for_FRC_2015.pdf

  * How to installing Subclipse & Configuring for Google Code<br> https://code.google.com/p/fastddf/wiki/EclipseSubclipseHowTo

  * On a brand new Eclipse Workspace, checking out the Aztechs code will throw a build path error for the 'wpilib' classpath. The fix is to create (and then delete) a dummy WPILib project in the workspace.  Use <b>File > New > Project... > WPILib Robot Java development > Robot Java Project</b>.  This somehow connects the workspace to WPILib.

  * Docuemntation on WPILIB and 2005 Controls:<br> http://wpilib.screenstepslive.com/s/4485
